寋字的基本解释

寋
jiàn
单独击磬。
难。
姓。

寋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎn］
［《廣韻》其偃切，上阮，羣。］
(1)击磬而不伴以其他乐器，古谓之“寋”。
(2)见“寋鄂”。
(3)姓。

寋字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　寋； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页288第23
【集韻】【韻會】九件切【正韻】九輦切，?音蹇。【爾雅·釋樂】徒鼓磬謂之寋。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?紀偃切，音湕。義同。一曰女字。　又【集韻】巨偃切【韻會】其偃切，?音鍵。義同。　又姓。【正字通】晉李特將寋碩，宋寋周輔。

寋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
寋字的起名意思

暂无。

寋
Basic explanation of words
寋
jiàn
Hit the chime alone.
difficult.
name.
寋
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎn］
["Guangyun" Qi Yanqie, Shangruan, group. ]
(1) Strike the chime without accompanying other musical instruments, which was called "寋" in ancient times.
(2) See "寋E".
(3) Last name.
寋
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Yin Ji 1】【Liu Zi Department】　寋; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 288 to 23
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Nine Pieces Cut [Zheng Rhyme] Nine Pieces Cut,? Yin Jian. 【Erya·Shile】The drum chime is called slander.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Ji Yan cut, Yin Ji. The same meaning. One is the female character.　 [Ji Yun] Ju Yan cut [Yun Hui] Its Yan cut, the sound key. The same meaning.　Another last name. 【Zhengzitong】The special generals of Jin Li, Mao Shuo, and Song Mao Zhou Fu.
